mapper.select:
SELECT R.REZ_NO, NVL(R.WH_CODE,'')AS WH_CODE , NVL(R.H_CODE,'')AS H_CODE, NVL(R.S_CODE,'')AS S_CODE, NVL(R.DC_CODE,'')AS DC_CODE, NVL(R.D_NO,'')AS D_NO, NVL(R.M_CODE,'')AS M_CODE, NVL(R.M_PLUS_NUM,'')AS M_PLUS_NUM, NVL(R.REZ_STATUS,'N')AS REZ_STATUS, NVL(TO_CHAR(R.REZ_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD'), '')AS REZ_DATE, R.WDATE, R.USER_ID, R.REZ_FULL_PRICE, NVL(R.C_CODE,'')AS C_CODE, NVL(R.REZ_POINT, 0)AS REZ_POINT, NVL(R.S_DATE, '') AS S_DATE, NVL(W.WH_NAME,'')AS WH_NAME, NVL(H.H_NAME,'')AS H_NAME, NVL(H.H_PRICE, 0)AS H_PRICE, NVL(H.H_FOOD, 0)AS H_FOOD, NVL(H.H_MIN, 0)AS H_MIN, NVL(H.H_IMGNAME,'')AS H_IMGNAME, NVL(H.H_CONTENT,'')AS H_CONTENT, NVL(H.H_DISCOUNT, 0)AS H_DISCOUNT, NVL(S.S_NAME,'')AS S_NAME, NVL(S.S_PRICE, 0)AS S_PRICE, NVL(S.S_DISCOUNT, 0)AS S_DISCOUNT, NVL(S.S_IMGNAME,'')AS S_IMGNAME, NVL(S.S_CONTENT,'')AS S_CONTENT, NVL(M.M_NAME,'')AS M_NAME, NVL(M.M_PRICE, 0)AS M_PRICE, NVL(M.M_PLUS, 0)AS M_PLUS, NVL(M.M_DISCOUNT, 0)AS M_DISCOUNT, NVL(M.M_IMGNAME,'')AS M_IMGNAME, NVL(M.M_CONTENT,'')AS M_CONTENT, NVL(C.DC_NAME,'')AS DC_NAME, NVL(D.D_NAME,'')AS D_NAME, NVL(D.D_PRICE, 0)AS D_PRICE, NVL(D.D_DISCOUNT, 0)AS D_DISCOUNT, NVL(D.D_IMGNAME,'')AS D_IMGNAME, NVL(D.D_CONTENT,'')AS D_CONTENT FROM WD_REZ R, WD_HALL H, WD_STUDIO S, WD_MAKEUP M, WD_DRESS D, WD_WEDDINGHALL W, WD_DRESS_COM C WHERE USER_ID = #{value} AND
H.WH_CODE = W.WH_CODE AND R.WH_CODE = H.WH_CODE AND R.H_CODE = H.H_CODE AND R.S_CODE = S.S_CODE AND D.DC_CODE = C.DC_CODE AND R.DC_CODE = D.DC_CODE AND R.D_NO = D.D_NO AND R.M_CODE = M.M_CODE
SELECT COUNT(REZ_NO) AS CNT FROM WD_REZ
mapper.update: UPDATE WD_REZ SET REZ_FULL_PRICE = (SELECT B.H_PRICE+(B.H_FOOD*B.H_MIN)+C.S_PRICE+D.D_PRICE+E.M_PRICE+(A.M_PLUS_NUM*E.M_PLUS) REZ_FULL_PRICE FROM WD_REZ A, WD_HALL B, WD_STUDIO C, WD_DRESS D, WD_MAKEUP E WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.WH_CODE = B.WH_CODE AND A.H_CODE = B.H_CODE AND A.S_CODE = C.S_CODE AND A.DC_CODE = D.DC_CODE AND A.D_NO = D.D_NO AND A.M_CODE = E.M_CODE) WHERE REZ_NO = #{rezNo} AND USER_ID = #{userId}

UPDATE WD_REZ SET DC_CODE = '', D_NO = ''
WHERE REZ_NO = #{rezNo} AND USER_ID = #{userId}

UPDATE WD_REZ
SET WH_CODE = '', H_CODE = '' WHERE REZ_NO = #{rezNo} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE WD_REZ SET S_CODE = '', S_DATE = NULL WHERE REZ_NO = #{rezNo} AND USER_ID = #{userId}
